tooltip.proficiency.exponential_scaling: Use exponential scaling instead of values defined on the tools/weapons/armour pages
text.proficiency.points_description:
The number of points a player needs to gain for each level is calculated using the exponential formula above.
Depending on the values set, this can make progression significantly (exponentially) slower at higher levels.
tooltip.proficiency.expo_base: The value needed to reach the first level
tooltip.proficiency.expo_power: Controls the curve of the exponential growth
text.proficiency.item_category_descripti: These are set values for the points required to reach each Proficiency level
text.proficiency.special_unlocks_descrip:
These are special progression levels unlockable by both:
  - Levelling a "number" of items to "Proficient"
  - Reaching "number" of points for that item type
   (Where "number" is a value set in the below fields)
text.proficiency.special_unlocks_example:
e.g. To unlock the Legendary Progression level for a pickaxe, (using the default values) you need to get 3 items to, or above,  Proficient
You then need to reach 25000 Progression points on that item
tooltip.proficiency.virtuoso_items: Number of items at PROFICIENT+ to unlock Virtuoso
tooltip.proficiency.legendary_items: Number of items at PROFICIENT+ to unlock Legendary
tooltip.proficiency.unrivaled_items: Number of items at PROFICIENT+ to unlock Unrivaled
